short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto login, course suggestions and exam notifications for Nordakademie students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your life as a Nordakademie student.
Features:
- Auto login for
    https://cis.nordakademie.de/
    https://moodle2.nordakademie.de/
    https://owa.nordakademie.de/
    https://gitlab2.nordakademie.de/
    All Shibboleth websites

- Get a notification when new exam results are released
- A small card in Moodle will show your upcoming courses in realtime
